tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have consulted Dr. Deven with immense pain in one of upper molar. He examined it with xray and suggested initial antibiotics course as there was no sign of decay instead of root canal. Luckily pain was reduced in few days. Couple of times in past, other dentists have directly suggested root canal for me and later I found that root cause was different. 

He did fillings to few other teeth which I was not aware about decay as there was no pain there. After few days, I was able to find the difference while chewing and gums were also into right shape. 

I would definitely recommend him for his honest suggestions and treatment to the point.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Deven's hospitality never made me realize that I was at Doctor's place. He was fluent in his communication and explained me my dental condition in great detail. Also I didn't feel any pain while undergoing my dental treatment under him. Overall my experience was good with him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Highly recommended doctor. Best for any dental treatment.  Experienced doctor and best for all types of dental treatments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Great doctor !, Speaks very friendly,clear all doubts with good explanation. Good management not much time to wait .Very much recommended

tags: None
review: The fillings of my wife's teeth came out with in 10 days! On the top of this the doctor refused to give me the bill /invoice copy post taking a payment of 3K. Won't recommend him to anyone. Sabka desntist was better than him at least the fillings stayed for 3 years!
reply_text:
There were multiple issues with the case which I would like to mention

1. Patient was in her 9th month of pregnancy and hence no xray could be taken inspite it was a very deep cavity with more than half of tooth structure decayed. Patient was informed that we are doing this filling in order to avoid the Root canal treatment at this stage considering her condition.
2. We have a policy to give bill to everyone, though it is possible that we might have asked to kindly collect the bill later. At no point in history of our clinic we have ever denied the bill to our patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was experiencing recurrent food lodgement between upper back teeth. Got filling done. Problem solved. Very happy.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Very happy that I got wisdom tooth removal at Dr. Devens Dentocare. I was a bit scared but Dr. Deven patiently explained me the procedure which helped me a lot. Will highly recommend him.

review: I had a fall breaking my front tooth. Got root canal treatment done for the tooth with cap. The cap is very toothlike and cannot be made out. Very very happy with the result.

The way he make patient comfortable by his friendly and comforting gesture is worth a mention.
He ensure too provide you best solution with minimal of pain and is cost effective too.
